meanings.sent1: My sibship includes my brother and sister.
meanings.sent2: The sibship between them is strong and supportive.
meanings.sent3: During the family reunion, our sibship made everyone laugh with our inside jokes.
meanings.sent4: The sibship bond is like a sturdy rope that keeps us connected.
meanings.sent5: Growing up together, our sibship formed an unbreakable bond.

meanings.definition: The state of being a sibling.
meanings.sent1: Being part of a sibship means having someone to share secrets with.
meanings.sent2: The sibship among the three brothers was evident in their shared laughter.
meanings.sent3: The sibship rivalry over who gets the last cookie is always amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: In the world of nature, the sibship of lion cubs symbolizes unity and strength.
meanings.sent5: The sibship relationship is a special bond that lasts a lifetime.
